data.meta_site_name: Harpeth Hills Memory Garden, Funeral Home, & Cremation Center
data.text:
Born in Nashville, Tennessee on August 7, 1956

Departed on September 4, 2019 and resided in Nashville, Tennessee

Visitation: Harpeth Hills Funeral Home & Cremation CenterMonday September 9, 2019 10:00am to 11:00amLife Celebration: Harpeth Hills Funeral Home & Cremation CenterMonday September 9, 2019 11:00am

Michael Bernard Bell- Age 63, of Nashville, passed away September 4, 2019.

He was born August 7, 1956 in Nashville, Tennessee. Michael attended both Hillwood High School and McGavock High School, where he graduated in 1974. He graduated with honors from Georgia Southwestern State University where he was a Political Science Major. Michael was an accomplished guitar player, a free spirit who loved the outdoors, animals, plants, holidays with family, and a good snowball fight. He had a strong faith in God and knowledge of the scriptures. Michael loved life's adventures, music, his family and friends.

Preceded in death by parents, Geraldine Johnson Bell & Bernard Bell. Survived by sister, Melinda Cherry (Robert); nieces, Julia Cherry (Avinash) & Kayla Cherry; nephews, David Buhl (Rachael), Mark Cherry & Brent Cherry (Lynne); great-nieces and nephews, Vivian, Niam & Sylvia.

A Life Celebration will be held 11:00 a.m., Monday. Visitation will be 10:00 a.m. -11:00 a.m., Monday at Harpeth Hills Funeral Home, 9090 Hwy 100, Nashville, TN, 37221, 615-646-9292, harpethhills.com. In Lieu of flowers donations may be made to Room in the Inn at roomintheinn.org.
